articles.title: LIVE: 11 die of starvation in Gaza; Israeli attacks kill 21 aid seekers
articles.description: Eleven more Palestinians in the besieged Gaza Strip have starved to death, bringing the total hunger-related deaths to 212, as Israel pushes ahead with its plan to seize Gaza City despite international condemnation and concerns over the humanitarian crisis.

articles.title: Trump to meet Putin on August 15 in Alaska
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump announced he will meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin on August 15 in Alaska to discuss ending the war in Ukraine, following the expiration of a ceasefire deadline.

articles.title: Wildfires are burning out of control in Southern California
articles.description: Wildfires, including the rapidly spreading Canyon Fire, are burning out of control in Southern California amidst extreme heat and dry conditions, forcing thousands of residents to evacuate their homes.
